name: PDFAnnotationMarkup
desc: A PDFAnnotationMarkup object appears as highlighting, underlining, or a strikethrough style applied to the text of a document. DeprecatedUse PDFAnnotationSubtype instead.

items.name: func quadrilateralPoints() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Gets the array of quadrilateral points defining the bounds of the markup.

items.name: func setQuadrilateralPoints([Any]!)
items.desc: Sets the array of quadrilateral points defining the bounds of the markup.

items.name: enum PDFMarkupType
items.desc: The styles available for markup annotations in PDFKit.
